WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Put your hand over your eye to watch over others.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You know that way cartoon characters and pirates watch out below them, with their hand shading their eye? That! Now imagine doing that right now.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you watch over your friends and neighbors you see movement in the distance. Oh no, it's Genghis Khan (ã‹ã‚“) and his army!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Welp, nothing much watching over them will do now. Genghis Khan is probably going to take over your town, so I guess you can watch if you want but... I wouldn't.

origin_of_ch_char_book: (çœ‹, kan, see; look at) The upside is the hand with 5 fingers (æ‰‹, shou, hand) shading the eye (ç›®, mu, eye). It looks like someone spreads a palm to block the sun and looks around. (è¦‹, è§, jian=chien, see; meet with) consists of an eye and a kneeling person (äºº, ren, human), depicting a subject sees up at the king or a senior, expressing his opinion.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand ", from " eye ", the original meaning is to make the line of sight contact people or things. "Said Wen": "Look at it. Look from your hands. ğ¥‰, look or look at it." Gui Fu's proof: "Everything is seen for trial, you can see with your hands, so you can see from your hands." Southern Song Liu Yiqing "Shi Shuo Xin Yu-Gui Zhen": "Yin Qi is sick and sleepy, so he will meet with people and politics."

" Look " can mean observation. "Book of Jin-Criminal Law Records": "The ancients said: Those who are good at government, look at people and set up education."

" Looking " also means looking. Tang Gaoshi, "Song History": "I don't know the world's scholars, but I still look at them as commoners."

" Watching " also means watching. Tang Wangjian "Recalling the Old Man in the Mountains after Drunk": "You must look at the moon when you are in the sun, and you will go upstairs when you fight hard.

" Looking " can be extended to hearing. Tang Dufu "Overnight in Xige, Xiaochengyuan, Twenty-One Cao Chang": "Looking at the monarch's talk about the royal family, I was touched and worried."

" Watching " can also mean guarding. In the Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Sixie's Qi Min YaoshuÂ·Raising Sheep: "Shepherd...or if you donâ€™t watch the game, it will be harmful to wolf dogs."

" Look " can also be used as a structural particle, which is used after a verb or verb structure to indicate an attempt. The Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Sixie's "Qi Min Yao Shu-The Method of Making Potato Lettuce": "Taste it, if it is not too astringent, the juice will reach one liter."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand ", from the " eye ", the original meaning is to make the line of sight contact people or things.

From " hand", from " eye", the original meaning is to make the line of sight contact people or things. "Said Wen": "Look at it. Look from your hands. ğ¥‰, look or look at it." Gui Fu's proof: "Everything is seen for trial, you can see with your hands, so you can see from your hands." Southern Song Liu Yiqing "Shi Shuo Xin Yu-Gui Zhen": "Yin Qi is sick and sleepy, so he will meet with people and politics." " Look" can mean observation. "Book of Jin-Criminal Law Records": "The ancients said: Those who are good at government, look at people and set up education." " Looking" also means looking. Tang Gaoshi, "Song History": "I don't know the world's scholars, but I still look at them as commoners." " Watching" also means watching. Tang Wangjian "Recalling the Old Man in the Mountains after Drunk": "You must look at the moon when you are in the sun, and you will go upstairs when you fight hard. " Looking" can be extended to hearing. Tang Dufu "Overnight in Xige, Xiaochengyuan, Twenty-One Cao Chang": "Looking at the monarch's talk about the royal family, I was touched and worried." " Watching" can also mean guarding. In the Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Sixie's Qi Min YaoshuÂ·Raising Sheep: "Shepherd...or if you donâ€™t watch the game, it will be harmful to wolf dogs." " Look" can also be used as a structural particle, which is used after a verb or verb structure to indicate an attempt. The Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Sixie's "Qi Min Yao Shu-The Method of Making Potato Lettuce": "Taste it, if it is not too astringent, the juice will reach one liter."

Meaning Mnemonic
Put your hand over your eye to watch over others.
You know that way cartoon characters and pirates watch out below them, with their hand shading their eye? That! Now imagine doing that right now.
Reading Mnemonic
As you watch over your friends and neighbors you see movement in the distance. Oh no, it's Genghis Khan (ã‹ã‚“) and his army!
Welp, nothing much watching over them will do now. Genghis Khan is probably going to take over your town, so I guess you can watch if you want but... I wouldn't.
